name: Witch Schools: Love Potions
description:
The main mechanics of the game is the movement and the ability to push various objects, and to pass the level you need to push objects and make 3 or more identical objects.

Witch School, a game where you have to mix and compose various spells to collect points.

In each level, you have to collect various components by moving around the level and moving various test tubes.
Features:
Make up different items from 3 identical components.
Move around the level.
Move objects.
Collect coin balls.
Complete the levels and get achievements.



History:
The main character is a student of the school of witches, and together with her you have to collect the same elements and comprehend the mastery of the new mechanics 3 in a row.
